description: Say goodbye to sticky situations. Just plug it in and heat it up in 20 minutes: the Remington smooth and silky wax kit provides lasting results. In fact, it provides up to six weeks of smooth and lasting results. The quick time, easy roll-on application, included wax, and included cloth waxing strips make this the perfect kit at the perfect price.
title: Remington Products WXA1080 Smooth and Silky Electric Roll-On Wax Kit
